sentences.en: A tremendous amount of work has been done on the purification of the starting material.
sentences.cn: 人们在提纯原始材料方面做了大量的工作.

sentences.en: Compared with other methods, aquatic plant purification method shows unique feature.
sentences.cn: 通过与其他方法的比较, 说明了水生植物净化法有其独特的优点.

sentences.en: Distillation has traditionally been the major system for water purification.
sentences.cn: 蒸馏法已传统地成了水提纯的主要方法.

sentences.en: Ethanolamines are also of value in the purification and the separation of gases.
sentences.cn: 乙醇胺在气体的纯化和分离方面也是有用的.

sentences.en: Formally wants to change magically , the paragraph, the number , the entire purification.
sentences.cn: 形式上要要点化、段落化 、 序号化 、 整洁化.

sentences.en: Hydrophobic interaction chromatography ( HIC ) is an attractive method for protein purification.
sentences.cn: 疏水作用色谱法 ( HIC ) 是一种有效的蛋白质分离纯化方法.

sentences.en: I knew whisky is distilled. You say "pure", but what is the difference between purification and separation?
sentences.cn: 我知道威士忌是蒸馏来的。你刚才说“纯”，提纯和分离有什么不同呢?。

sentences.en: I saw this policy of “purification” up close.
sentences.cn: 我目睹的了“净化”政策的整个过程。

sentences.en: It is permitted for purification workshop to use ordinary floor drain.
sentences.cn: 净化车间绝对不允许采用普通的排污地漏.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To investigate the impurities of the hyodeoxycholic acid and its purification.
sentences.cn: 目的研究猪去氧胆酸中的杂质成分和纯化方法.

sentences.en: One third of their entire site is given up to a water-purification plant.
sentences.cn: 他们将整块地的1/3用于建净水厂。

sentences.en: The country has already produced nanotechnology products for export in areas including food packaging, water purification and herbal medicine.
sentences.cn: 该国已经生产了供出口的纳米技术产品，其领域包括食品包装、水净化以及草药。

sentences.en: The fact that the yoga is performed in the nude is significant because in the nude status, the toxins in the body find an outlet leading to purification of body and soul.
sentences.cn: 这种瑜伽裸体进行，这一事实非常重要，因为在裸体的状态中，身体中的“毒素”会找到一个出口而后引向肉体与灵魂的净化。

sentences.en: The paths of purification and analytical approach are described.
sentences.cn: 同时简述了对甲苯磺酸的精制和分析方法.

sentences.en: The preparation and purification process of silicon tetrachloride were chiefly introduced.
sentences.cn: 重点介绍了四氯化硅的制备及精制工艺.

sentences.en: The start of proteomics is purification.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质学的开端是蛋白质的提纯.

sentences.en: The various methods of purification through the use of selective adsorption have several features in common.
sentences.cn: 使用选择吸附的各种净化方法都有几个共同特征.

sentences.en: The water goes through three stages of purification.
sentences.cn: 这水经过3个步骤的净化.

sentences.en: This article introduces and discusses the purification of ordinary nitrogen by coarse titanium powder and its application in gas nitridation technology of titanium surface.
sentences.cn: 介绍和讨论利用粗颗粒钛粉末净化普通氮气及其在钛表面气体氮化工艺中的应用。

sentences.en: To become an Essene there was a period of preparation and purification that extended over three years.
sentences.cn: 成为一个艾赛尼派教徒要准备很长时间和超过三年以上的净化时期。

sentences.en: Water Filters, Ceramic Filter Replacement, Water Purification Systems Filters - Air, Gas, Liquid.
sentences.cn: 采购产品加水过滤器, 陶瓷的过滤器, 水洗净系统过滤器 - 空气, 瓦斯, 液体.

words.tran_cn: [食品] 净化器；清洁者；精炼器；精炼者
使纯净；去除（purify的过去分词）；精炼

phrases.tran_cn: 水净化器；水净化系统；纯水系统

trans.tran_cn: 洗净，涤罪，提纯，（犹太妇女按教规在月经后行的）洁净礼
